questions: I’m sorry to hear that you’re going through this. To assist you with your claim, please help me with some information.
Please let me know the insured name
Could you please provide the date of the medical incident.
Could you please provide the plicy number
What’s the name of the hospital or medical facility where it was performed?
Do you have your policy number and any other relevant insurance information handy?
Can you tell me a bit about the surgery you had and what led up to it?
How are you feeling now? Are you currently receiving any follow-up care or treatment?
Who was the primary surgeon or doctor in charge of your procedure?
Do you have any medical reports, bills, or documentation from the surgery and follow-up care that you can provide?
Could you give me a summary of the medical expenses incurred and any out-of-pocket costs you’ve had to pay so far?
Are there any ongoing treatments, medications, or therapies that are part of your recovery process?
Do you have support from family or friends during your recovery? Is there anything else we can do to assist you during this time?
Is there any immediate need or concern you have regarding your claim that we can address right away?
What’s the best way for us to keep you updated on the status of your claim? Would you prefer phone calls, emails, or another method?
